20.2 A simple Dylan exception protocol

In Sections 20.2.1 through 20.2.4, we show how to modify the three methods in Section 20.1.1 to use the basic tools that Dylan provides for indicating and responding to exceptional situations.

20.2.2 - Simple condition handling
20.2.3 - Definition of a recovery protocol
20.2.4 - Continuation from errors
